info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Salt Lake and northwestern Utah Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camp Williams, or 14 miles southwest of Sandy, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Sandy, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Alpine, Bluffdale, Little Cottonwood Canyon, Camp Williams, Little Cottonwood Creek Valley, Granite, Oquirrh and Kearns. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 281 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
